pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation of Graphical Correlation Matrices // Simulation of correlation matrices possibly constrained by a given undirected or acyclic directed graph. In particular, the package provides functions that implement the simulation methods described in Crdoba et al. (2018a) doi:10.1007/978-3-030-03493-1_13, Crdoba et al. (2018b) doi:10.1145/2695664.2695717 and Crdoba et al. (2019) arXiv:1909.01062.
